name: Hidden Object Travel USA - New York & Hawaii Quest
name_original: Hidden Object Travel USA - New York & Hawaii Quest
description:
Find 100’s of Hidden Objects across the USA! Visit New York, Washington DC, Florida, Chicago, Texas, Las Vegas, Seattle, LA, San Francisco & Hawaii. 40+ Levels! Travel around the Map from East Coast to West Coast!

Real Photos of Favorite USA Cities! Beautifully designed Hidden Objects game! Hidden Objects Road Trip is an Exciting Adventure with a Variety of Game Play. Find All Objects in the States and earn a Green Marker Flag on the Map!

See NYC’s Central Park, famous Hollywood sign, Chicago’s “Bean,” Miami Beach, US Capitol Building, San Francisco’s Red Trolley, Vegas Casinos, Hawaii’s Tropical Beaches, Austin Skyline, Seattle’s Space Needle, and more! Pack up the Car & Take a Road Trip Vacation!

4 Ways to Play- Challenge, Gatherer, Word, Image! Quick Play Bonus Rounds with Unlimited Hints & Unlimited Time – Just Relax after a Long Car Ride!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A Fun, Object Quest App for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Seek & Find, Brain and Word Fans!

Brain Challenging Adventure with Beautiful Scenery! LIFE IS A HIGHWAY!

Hidden Objects – Road Trip features:
40+ Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Hints & Timed Challenges
Drag & Zoom Scene to Search for Objects
Touch Backgrounds to Move Up & Down
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words & Bonus Objects (Words Highlighted in Green)
Find Objects by Words or Pictures
Real USA Photos with 100’s of Objects
4 Ways to Play- Challenge, Gatherer, Word, Image
Quick Play Bonus Round- Unlimited Hints & Time
Artistically Crafted Levels


Instructions:
Select State from Main Map
Select 4 Ways to Play & See Game for Instructions
Successfully Complete 4 Ways to Play & Earn a Green Marker Flag on Main Map

Quick Play- 6 Bonus Rounds. Unlimited Hints. Unlimited Time. Just Relax after a Long Car Ride!
